sentences.en: But, owing to the nature of ancient kinship, as we have seen it, exogamy afforded no proper security against the intermixture of persons near of kin.
sentences.cn: 但是，由于古代血族关系的性质，如我们所知，异族结婚不提供适当的安全反对血缘亲近的人们的混合…

sentences.en: Exogamy prevents the ill effects of inbreeding and promotes evolution of human race.
sentences.cn: 其一,防止了近亲婚配所带来的不良影响,促进了人种的进化.

sentences.en: Exogamy The fusion of gametes produced by organisms that are not closely related.
sentences.cn: (异系配合):亲缘关系较远的生物体产生的配子相互融合.

sentences.en: For two millennia, exogamy was a major transgression for Jews.
sentences.cn: 两千年来, 异族通婚一直是犹太人的一大禁忌.

sentences.en: Last, it analyzes the relationship between totemism and exogamy, and the three functions of exogamy.
sentences.cn: 最后, 本文分析了图腾崇拜和外婚制的关系, 以及外婚制的三大功能.

words.tran_cn: 异族结婚的，异族通婚的

trans.tran_cn: <人>异族通婚，与外族通婚，<生>异系配合，异系交配
trans.tran_en: the custom or an act of marrying a person belonging to another tribe, clan, or similar social unit
